chrome.storage

Top-Level Variables
storage: ChromeStorage
Classes
ChromeStorage
StorageArea
StorageChange

Use the chrome.storage API to store, retrieve, and track changes to user data.

Top-Level Variables

static final ChromeStorage storage

Accessor for the chrome.storage namespace.

Class ChromeStorage

Fields
local: dynamic
managed: dynamic
onChanged: Stream
sync: dynamic
Getters and Setters
local: dynamic
managed: dynamic
onChanged: Stream<dynamic>
sync: dynamic

Fields

final dynamic local
final dynamic managed
final Stream onChanged
final dynamic sync

Getters and Setters

dynamic get local

Items in the local storage area are local to each machine.

dynamic get managed

Items in the managed storage area are set by the domain administrator, and are read-only by the extension; trying to modify this namespace results in an error.

Stream<dynamic> get onChanged

Fired when one or more items change.

dynamic get sync

Items in the sync storage area are synced using Chrome Sync.
